    • 方法详细资料

      • determineCommUnits

        protected java.util.List<CommissionUnit> determineCommUnits(Transaction trans)
                                                     throws ApplicationException
        从类复制的说明: AbstractCommissionBalanceService
        Sub-implementation class should implement this method to determine the CommissionUnits. For some transaction, such as 'IG batch validation', multiple CommissionUnit should be returned, as it may involve multiple games, and each game will be assigned different commission rate.
        指定者:
        determineCommUnits 在类中 AbstractCommissionBalanceService
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • getOperatorCommissionDao

        public OperatorCommissionDao getOperatorCommissionDao()

      • setOperatorCommissionDao

        public void setOperatorCommissionDao(OperatorCommissionDao operatorCommissionDao)
